alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:51PM EDT until June 17 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Boyd County in northeastern Kentucky... Greenup County in northeastern Kentucky... Southern Gallia County in southeastern Ohio... Lawrence County in southeastern Ohio... Central Mason County in western West Virginia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 151 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Webster to near Vanceburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashland, Ironton, Coal Grove, Lake Vesuvius, Greenup, Greenbo Lake, Naples, Load, Letitia, Flatwoods, Russell, Vernon, Waterloo, Raceland, Worthington, Wurtland, Bellefonte, Aid, Westwood and Crown City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
